title: Heart South Cardiovascular
description:
The Heart South Cardiovascular Group app connects you, the patient, with your healthcare provider as well as helps conveniently manage care for you and your family members.  

With the Heart South Cardiovascular Group app, you can: 
• Get the care you need quickly and easily
• Take care of your loved ones
• Connect with your healthcare provider
• View Profile
• Receive alerts
• View upcoming appointments
• Communicate with your healthcare provider from the comfort of your home or on the go
• Share data securely and in real time with healthcare provider
• Request prescription refills 

To use the Heart South Cardiovascular Group App you will need an invitation or login from your provider. Please contact your health care provider directly for assistance with login or require support for the app.

summary: Heart South Cardiovascular Health Care app
